Contents.Content: select br.病人ID as brPatientId, br.姓名 as PatientName, br.性别 as PatientSex, br.出生日期 as PatientBirthday, br.年龄 as PatientAge, br.身份证号 as PatientIDCard, br.医保号 as sbh, br.家庭地址 as PatientAddress, br.联系人电话 as PatientPhone, zy.住院号 as InPatientCode, zy.病人编号 PatientId, zy.病区 as Wardarea, zy.床位 as BedNo, zy.床位护士 as BedNurse from gys_brxx br left join gys_zyxx zy on br.病人ID=zy.病人编号 where 1=1 {0}

select --病人基本信息 br.病人ID as VALUE,--病人编号 br.病人ID as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.姓名 as NAME, --病人姓名 br.姓名 as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.性别 as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 --br.出生日期 as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 --br.年龄 as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.床位 as BEDNO, --床位 zy.病区 as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.床位护士 as BEDNURSE --床位护士 from gys_brxx br left join gys_zyxx zy on br.病人ID=zy.病人编号 where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.patient_id as VALUE,--病人编号 br.name as NAME, --病人姓名 br.name as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.sex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.date_of_birth as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.age as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.operation_no as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.operating_room as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.dept_stayed as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.sssj as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.operator as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.operation_desc as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from Infecon_ssxx ss inner join pat_operation br on ss.patient_id=br.patient_id inner join pat_inp zy on br.patient_id=zy.patient_id where 1=1 {0}

select br.病人ID as brPatientId, br.姓名 as PatientName, br.性别 as PatientSex, br.出生日期 as PatientBirthday, br.年龄 as PatientAge, br.身份证号 as PatientIDCard, br.医保号 as sbh, br.家庭地址 as PatientAddress, br.联系人电话 as PatientPhone, gh.挂号系统编号 as RegisterCode, gh.急诊或门诊 as OutPatientemergncy, gh.挂号时间 as RegisterDatetime, gh.挂号科室 as RegisterDepartment, gh.AS挂号号 as RegisterNumber from gys_brxx br left join gys_ghxx gh on br.病人ID=gh.挂号系统编号 where 1=1 {0} order by gh.挂号时间 Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.病人ID as VALUE,--病人编号 br.姓名 as NAME, --病人姓名 br.姓名 as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.性别 as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.出生日期 as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.年龄 as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 gh.挂号系统编号 as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.急诊或门诊 as OUTPATIENTEMERGENCY,--挂号类型 gh.挂号时间 as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 gh.AS挂号号 as REGISTERNUMBER, --挂号序号 gh.挂号科室 as REGISTERDEPARTMENT --挂号科室 from gys_brxx br left join gys_ghxx gh on br.病人ID=gh.挂号系统编号 where 1=1 {0} order by gh.挂号时间 Desc
